Viewing the View Manager Menus

The View Manager has its own set of menu options, which are described below.

Server Menu

Select Server...

Choose the source server.

Lock Server

Lock the server so that users cannot make file changes while the operation is running.

Exit

Exit View Manager.

File Menu

Open

Open an existing properties file.

Save

Save a newly created or edited properties file.

Display Menu

Minimal Tree in Preview and Run Planes

Select to display only projects, views, folders, and files that will change or have changed as a result of the run operation. Clear to display all projects, views, folders, and files.

View Menu

Configure Source View

Current configuration: Configure the source view to the current configuration.

Labeled configuration: Configure the source view to a particular view label.

Promotion state configuration: Configure the source view to a specific promotion state.

Tools Menu

Options

Display Options dialog, which allows you to select specific options for the merge operation. This dialog includes General, Missing Objects, Merge, Utilities, Locking, and File tabs.

Run Menu

Preview

Source to Target: Preview a source-to-target synchronization.

Bidirectional: Preview a bidirectional synchronization.

Missing Objects Only: Preview a missing objects synchronization.

Sync

Source to Target: Run a source-to-target synchronization.

Bidirectional: Run a bidirectional synchronization.

Missing Objects Only: Run a missing-objects-only synchronization.

Copy to Target

Run a copy-to-target operation.

Resume

Resume a View Manager operation that has halted.

View Log

View the View Manager log to see whether any errors have occurred.

Find Menu

Next Difference

Find the next difference.

Previous Difference

Find the previous difference.

Next Manual Merge

Find the next pair of files that need to be manually merged.

Previous Manual Merge

Find the previous pair of files that need to be manually merged.

Next Locked File

Find the next locked file.

Previous Locked File

Find the previous locked file.

Help Menu

About View Manager

Display copyright and version information.
